"Swords":
"Swords are standard striking weapons that are easy for beginners to handle.

Compared to other melee weapons, Swords have a long reach and very few gimmicks, which makes it easy to learn how to use them.


<%WeaponActionText>: Guard."

"This explains the Sword Gear system.

When you learn the skill \"Sword Gear\", a Gear Gauge is added to the top of your Weapon Palette. Hitting enemies with Sword attacks will fill the Gear Gauge.

As the Gear Gauge fills, your Photon Arts gain increased attack range, and some Photon Arts can be charged quicker.

The Sword Gear Gauge empties slowly over time, so keep on attacking to keep the Gear Gauge filled."
